casebody.data:
NORTH CAROLINA STATE BOARD OF EDUCATION
v.
The STATE of North Carolina and Mark Johnson, in His Official Capacity No. 333PA17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2017 Andrew H. Erteschik, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Robert F. Orr, Attorney at Law, Asheville, Saad Gul, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, John Michael Durnovich, Attorney at Law, for North Carolina State Board of Education. Amar Majmundar, Special Deputy Attorney General, Olga E. Vysotskaya, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Hardy Lewis, Attorney at Law, Philip R. Isley, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Johnson, Mark.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 5th of October 2017 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of December 2017."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).

Martin, C.J. recused
